head.title: Mandatory School Closure - Altamont CUSD #10 District Office

meta.content: At this time, all Altamont schools will be closed Tuesday, March 17 through Monday, March 30 as the result of a mandatory school closure. Please note that this does include all school sponsored activities as well.
